scripts.export-android: mkdir -p ../react-native-ota-updates/ota && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ../react-native-ota-updates/ota/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ../react-native-ota-updates/ota && zip -j ../react-native-ota-updates/ota/index.android.bundle.zip ../react-native-ota-updates/ota/index.android.bundle && rm ../react-native-ota-updates/ota/index.android.bundle
scripts.export-ios: mkdir -p ../react-native-ota-updates/ota && react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ../react-native-ota-updates/ota/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ../react-native-ota-updates/ota && zip -j ../react-native-ota-updates/ota/main.jsbundle.zip ../react-native-ota-updates/ota/main.jsbundle && rm ../react-native-ota-updates/ota/main.jsbundle
